column4: can I triple boot Ubuntu? my windows computer has a recovery partition on it as well
when I tried to install with CD, it wouldn't let me set up more than two OS
the fedora installer let me 'force' primary partition. I probably am. I have a MBR partition, a windows partition, a system partition, and a recovery
If you have... Windows, Recovery, Ubuntu, and Swap... That's 4 partitions
